Stylecow plugins

  • Support for CSS incoming features:

    Emulate some features not implemented yet in all browsers.

    • color

      Manipulate colors using the CSS Colors Module Level 4 syntax

    • matches

      Add support for :matches() selector

    • calc

      Add support for `calc() function (only in cases when can be resolved)

    • custom media

      Add support for @custom-media at-rule

    • custom selector

      Add support for @custom-selector at-rule

    • variables

      Use variables in the CSS with the w3c standard syntax

  • Language extensions:

    Emulate some features that may be added to css in a future.

    • nested rules

      Unwraps nested rules (using the proposed Tab Atkins’ syntax)

    • extend

      Use placeholders and @extend at-rule. (using the proposed Tab Atkins’ syntax)

  • Utilities:

    Css optimizations

    • import

      Insert the code of the @import at-rules with relative urls

    • base64

      To embed base64-encoded images in the css

  • Code fixing:

    To fix css issues, or generate css fallback for old browsers

    • fixes

      Fixes automatically some well-known browsers issues

    • flex

      Generate the css fallback for browsers supporting old syntax of flexbox (webkit and explorer).

    • webkit-gradient

      Generate the css fallback for webkit browsers supporting the old syntax of css gradient.

    • prefixes

      Adds automatically all vendor prefixes needed. Uses the caniuse database to keep the prefixes updated.

    • rem

      Adds fallback for rem values in pixels.

  • Old IE:

    To emulate some features in old Internet Explorer using -ms-filter property

    • msfilter background alpha

      Emulate the rgba() background in Internet Explorer 8 and lower using ms filters

    • msfilter linear gradient

      Emulate the linear-gradient() background in Internet Explorer 8 and lower using ms filters

    • msfilter-transform

      Emulate the CSS 2d transformations in Internet Explorer 8 and lower using ms filters
